en: Now concerning the collection for the saints, as I gave order to the churches of Galatia, so also do ye.
hmr: Chun, mi inthienghai ta dinga thawlâwm thu kha chu, Galati rama kohran hai kuomah thu ka pêk angin nangni khawmin lo thaw ve ro.

en: Upon the first day of the week let each one of you lay by him in store, as he may prosper, that no collections be made when I come.
hmr: Ni saria ni hmasatak peia chun mi tinin, malsâwmna in hmu zie ang peiin siekhâwl seng unla, ka hung phaa thawlâwm dâwl hrim a um nawna dingin.

en: And when I arrive, whomsoever ye shall approve, them will I send with letters to carry your bounty unto Jerusalem:
hmr: Chun, in lunginsietna thilpêk chu Jerusalema fepui dingin ka hung tlung phaleh tûkhawm ṭha in ti ti lekhahai chawiin tir ka tih.

en: and if it be meet for me to go also, they shall go with me.
hmr: Chun, ka fe vena âwm a ni lem chun, kei leh fêng an tih.

en: But I will come unto you, when I shall have passed through Macedonia; for I pass through Macedonia;
hmr: Chun, Makedonia ram ka fang suok hnungin in kuomah hung ka tih: Makedonia ram chu ka fang hrim hrim ding a ni sih a.

en: but with you it may be that I shall abide, or even winter, that ye may set me forward on my journey whithersoever I go.
hmr: Nangni kuoma ruok chu ka châm zing a ni thei, thlasik sûng po khawm a ni el thei; khâwlai khawm ka fena taphawta nangniin in mîn thla theina dingin.

en: For I do not wish to see you now by the way; for I hope to tarry a while with you, if the Lord permit.
hmr: Tuta fe malam ela hmu cheu ka nuom nawh a, Lalpain rem a ti chun in kuoma sâwt deu châm ka beisei sih a.

en: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost;
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, Pentikost chen Ephesia hin châm zing ka tih,

en: for a great door and effectual is opened unto me, and there are many adversaries.
hmr: kawtkhâr lientak le ṭangkai tak chu ka ta dingin ân hawng sih a, dotuhai tamtak an um bawk.

en: Now if Timothy come, see that he be with you without fear; for he worketh the work of the Lord, as I also do:
hmr: Chun, Timothe kha a hung tlung chun ṭi loa in kuoma a umna dingin fîmkhur ro; keiin ka thaw ang bawkin Lalpa sin chu a thaw sih a.

en: let no man therefore despise him. But set him forward on his journey in peace, that he may come unto me: for I expect him with the brethren.
hmr: Chuleiin, tûkhawmin hmusit naw raw se; ka kuoma a hung theina dingin thlamuongtakin inthla lem ro, unauhai ruolin ama lo hmu ka beisei sih a.

en: But as touching Apollos the brother, I besought him much to come unto you with the brethren: and it was not at all his will to come now; but he will come when he shall have opportunity.
hmr: Ei unau Appolo thu kha chu, unauhai ruola in kuoma hung dingin ka ngên rak a, ana chu, tuta ṭum chu hung a nuom naw tawp el; a remchâng pha ruok chu hung a tih.

en: Watch ye, stand fast in the faith, quit you like men, be strong.
hmr: Invêng unla, ringnaa chun ngîr det unla, insukhuoi unla, hrâttakin um ro,

en: Let all that ye do be done in love.
hmr: In thaw taphawt chu hmangai- naa thaw ni raw se.

en: Now I beseech you, brethren (ye know the house of Stephanas, that it is the firstfruits of Achaia, and that they have set themselves to minister unto the saints),
hmr: Unauhai, ka ngên cheu a nih: Stephan sûnghai chu Akaia rama awihai hmaṭhuoitu an na, mi inthienghai rawng bâwl dingin an inpêk ti in hriet a,

en: that ye also be in subjection unto such, and to every one that helpeth in the work and laboreth.
hmr: chuong ang mihai kuoma le sinthawa ṭhangpui le sin inrim taphawt kuoma chun intuklût dingin.

en: And I rejoice at the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus: for that which was lacking on your part they supplied.
hmr: Chun, Stephan hai, Phortunata hai, Akaika hai an hung hi ka lâwm a nih, in um naw khawm inlang loa an mi siem lei hin.

en: For they refreshed my spirit and yours: acknowledge ye therefore them that are such.
hmr: Anni hin ka lungril le nangni lungril an mi sukhar sih a; chuongchun, hieng ang mi hi lâwm ro.

en: The churches of Asia salute you. Aquila and Prisca salute you much in the Lord, with the church that is in their house.
hmr: Asia ram kohranhai hin chibai an bûk cheu. Akuila le Priskilla, an ina kohran inkhawmhai le hin Lalpaa chun chibai tamtakin an bûk cheu.

en: All the brethren salute you. Salute one another with a holy kiss.
hmr: Unau po po hin chibai an bûk cheu. Infâwp inthiengin chibai inbûk seng ro.

en: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand.
hmr: Kei Paulain keima kut ngeia chibai ka bûkna cheu a ni hi.

en: If any man loveth not the Lord, let him be anathema. Maranatha.
hmr: Tûkhawmin Lalpa a hmangai naw chun ṭawngsephurin um raw se. Ei Lalpa chu a hung ie.

en: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with you.
hmr: Lalpa Isu Krista lunginsietna chu in kuomah um raw se.

en: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus. Amen.
hmr: Krista Isua ka hmangaina hi in rênga kuomah um raw se. Amen.
